tasks.title: Gather Berlin tenancy, Anmeldung, insurance and pet passport papers
tasks.description: Collect all important documents and make copies. Store digital versions in cloud storage.

tasks.title: Find and book Darya's temporary Frankfurt apartment
tasks.description: Look for a pet-friendly furnished apartment for 1-2 months starting June 1st.

tasks.title: Send notice to Berlin landlord
tasks.description: Target handover date: July 31st. Check contract for notice period requirements.

tasks.title: Notify Berlin electricity & internet providers
tasks.description: Cancel services effective July 31st. Check for any early termination fees.

tasks.title: Ask cousin/uncle for help with apartment move-out
tasks.description: See if they can help with packing, cleaning, or transportation.

tasks.title: Create spreadsheet to track relocation expenses
tasks.description: Set up categories for different expenses to make reimbursement easier.

tasks.title: Book Darya & cat transportation to Frankfurt
tasks.description: Research pet-friendly transportation options for end of May.

tasks.title: Get quotes from moving companies
tasks.description: Contact at least 3 moving companies for quotes for July move.

tasks.title: Prepare Darya's documents for Frankfurt Anmeldung
tasks.description: Ensure all necessary documents are ready for registration at the new address.

tasks.title: Start viewing permanent apartments in Frankfurt
tasks.description: Begin search for long-term apartment that meets our requirements.

notes.title: Relocation Budget Notes
notes.content:
Darya's company offers €7,000 for relocation expenses. We need to keep all receipts for:
- Moving company costs
- Temporary housing
- Travel to Frankfurt
- Initial setup costs for new apartment
notes.author: paul

notes.title: Frankfurt Apartment Requirements
notes.content:
For our permanent apartment in Frankfurt, we need:
- At least 70m²
- Pet-friendly
- Max 30 min commute to Kia office
- Balcony or garden access
- Storage for bikes
- Close to public transportation
notes.author: darya

notes.title: Berlin Apartment Handover Checklist
notes.content:
- Clean entire apartment
- Repair any damages
- Remove all personal items
- Take meter readings (electricity, water, heating)
- Return all keys
- Complete handover protocol with landlord
notes.author: paul

notes.title: Cat Travel Preparations
notes.content:
To prepare our cat for the move:
- Ensure vaccinations are up to date
- Get health certificate from vet before travel
- Buy comfortable carrier for train/car journey
- Pack familiar bedding and toys
- Bring supply of regular food and medication
notes.author: darya
